mosinstall.name: Typewriterticker
mosinstall.author: Blokwatch
mosinstall.description: Modified latestnews module which shows items in a typewriter newsticker style. Output can link to original article (like mod_latestnews) or a custum url. To link to a custom url, create an article, use the title field to enter the ticker message and enter the url to link to in the article intro text.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: type
param.label: Module Mode
param.description: Allows you to control which type of Content to display in the module

param.name: linkto
param.label: Link Mode
param.description: Ticker items link to original article or url entered in article intro text
param.option: Link to url in intro text

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show/Hide items designated for the Frontpage - only works when in Content Items only mode

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category or set of Categories (to specify more than one Category, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: secid
param.label: Section ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Secion or set of Sections (to specify more than one Section, seperate with a comma , ).
